alert.message: The average CPU usage is above 90% in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [CPU usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average CPU usage is above 90% in the last 30 minutes.
alert.name: Pager: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [CPU usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average memory usage is above 90% in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Memory usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average memory usage is above 90% in the last 30 minutes.
alert.name: Pager: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Memory usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average disk usage is above 90% in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Pager: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Disk path / usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."disk" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "path"='/' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average disk usage is above 90% in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Pager: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Disk path /mnt usage above 90%] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."disk" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "path"='/mnt' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average network receive rate is above 60MBps in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Network receive rate above 60MB/s] alert

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "interface"='eth0' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average network send rate is above 60MBps in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Network send rate above 60MB/s] alert

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "interface"='eth0' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average network receive error rate is above 0 in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Network receive error rate above 0] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("err_in") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "interface"='eth0' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: The average network send error rate is above 0 in the last 5 minutes.
alert.name: Email: [<REGION>] [<NAME>] [<LIFECYCLE>] [<INSTANCETYPE>] [<PUBLICIP>/<PRIVATEIP>] [Network send error rate above 0] alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("err_out") AS "mean_value" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host"=~ /<NODENAME>/ AND "interface"='eth0' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
